You've been working your wonders when crushing candies. Here's an opportunity to get the rewards and recognition you deserve!

How does it work?

Well, you only need to continue to play! Nothing complicated to learn here. When it's active, Magic Dash will do the rest. Passing each level in the game will award you the first in a series of boosters for your journey forward. The first is a color bomb on the board for the next levels you'll start. Brilliant!
But that's not the end as there's more to be won if you continue..! If you continue to pass levels without losing a life there's a 2nd stage, with another extra booster that will add to your levels . Keep playing without losing a life and these will deliver to each level you play.
